content: complimentary pattern holiday cheer mini sweater design by nancy ekvall pattern no for use with 202348 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted holiday cheer mini sweater design by nancy ekvall description a cute mini sweater that will complement the previously released mini hat and mini mitts patterns mix and match your colors or try some fun embroidery the options are endless happy holidays experience level gauge in stockinette st 6 sts and 8 row = 1 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements 3 one circumference 2 ½ height materials yarn needles 4mm double pointed needles or size needed woolstok worsted bundle size 6 to obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle holiday cheer color shown color shown no 1300 no 1302 cast iron gravel road color shown color shown no 1303 no 1306 highland fleece wild thyme color shown color shown no 1309 no 1310 earth ivy cranberry compote color shown no 1315 red rock p 02 blue sky fibers other tools stitch marker & tapestry needle notes pattern is written for a solid sweater add colorwork as desired using photos as inspiration one mini hank will make one sweater step no 1 sweater body k7 put 7 sts on hold for sleeve k9 put next 7 round 10 sts on hold for 2nd sleeve k2 18 sts co 16 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to mark start of round k rnds 11-18 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round rnds 1 2 rnds 19-20 *k5 kfb k1 kfb repeat from * to end 20 sts bobble in patt round 3 k round 4 sleeves make 2 *k5 kfb k3 kfb repeat from * to end 24 sts round 5 return held sts and pick up 1 st under arm join in the round 6 k round 8 sts round 7 *k5 kfb k5 kfb repeat from * to end 28 sts rnds 1-5 k round 8 k round 6 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 9 *k5 kfb k7 kfb repeat from * to end 32 sts bobble in patt step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p 03 blue sky fibers abbreviations co cast on repeat repeat dpns double pointed needles round s round s k knit st s stitch es kfb knit into the front and back of * repeat the directions between stitch the asterisks as many times as p purl indicated pm place marker p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa
